name: vscode-bridge
description: Expose VS Code capabilities over a local JSON-RPC API for external agents.

commands.title: VS Code Bridge: Show Session Token

bridge.enabled.description: Enable the local JSON-RPC bridge server.

bridge.port.description: Local port for the bridge WebSocket server.

bridge.pairing.exportTokenPath.description: If set, the extension will write the session token to this local file path (workspace-relative by default) for seamless controller pairing.

bridge.restrictions.commands.allow.description: If non-empty, only these VS Code commands may be executed via ui.focus/ui.openPanel.

bridge.restrictions.commands.deny.description: Commands that are explicitly blocked from execution via the bridge.

scripts.vsix: npm run build && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('../dist',{recursive:true})" && vsce package --no-dependencies --allow-missing-repository --allow-missing-license -o ../dist/vscode-bridge.vsix
